date: stated on February 2, 2019 in a Facebook post:
title: No, Hillary Clinton wasn't a black face photographer.
text: The call for the Governor of Virginia to resign following the appearance of a picture of the book "Black Face" has raised old allegations that Hillary Clinton is also guilty of such blatant racist behaviour. The Democrats won't like this. ∙ Read Facebook article published in February 2. The picture shows a picture of what looks like a woman in a black face and a man wearing pants and a hay hat. "Clinton's been at a costume party for many years." "I'm pretty sure Hillary would never want to let this picture spread, there's a young Bill, with Hillary in BLAKFACE," says an extra text under the picture. "Let's (so) make this go to Veral, shall we?" This article was referred to as part of Facebook's efforts to combat false news and misleading information in its news broadcast. ∙ (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) This is not a new claim about Clinton, but we are here to reveal it. On January 11, 2021, Facebook, in an article in Facebook, Nancy Belusi, was no longer the Speaker of the House of Representatives by Samantha Butterman, 12 January 2021, Mark Burns, pastor and supporter of Trump, retweeting the picture in August 2016 - and I apologized. "This claimed to be from Bill Clinton and Hillary Clinton in the Black Face," the anchor CNN Alisyn Camerota said in an interview in 2016 with Burns. "That's not true. This order has been refuted and refuted repeatedly. This was seen in previous presidential races. Then why share it?" "I didn't have the right information," said Burns, who also returned on Twitter a photo of Clinton with the blonde braids. Nor have we been able to find any credible original source of this image or supporting evidence. It doesn't pass the smell test. The eyes of the woman appear in the image we saw brown, not blue, like Hillary Clinton. While the man in the picture may look like former President Clinton, it's just a transient resemblance. We're assessing this allegation pants on fire! Sharing the facts 2019-02-04 21:49:55 UTC Politics Fact 1 1 7 PoliticFact Dacting: Pants on Fire says Hillary Clinton is wearing a black face.
